title: MOTOROLA e40 (Carbon Gray, 64 GB)  (4 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Charger, USB Cable, SIM Tool, User Guides
product_specification.Display Type: HD+ IPS LCD Max Vision Display
product_specification.Other Display Features: 90Hz Refresh Rate, 20:9 Aspect Ratio, Water Repellent Design
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Rear Camera Setup: 48 MP (f/1.79, 0.8μm, 4 in 1 with 1.6 μm, Quad Pixel Technology, PDAF) + 2 MP Macro (f/2.4, 1.75um Pixel Size) + 2 MP Depth (f/2.4, 1.75um Pixel Size), Primary Camera Software: Portrait Mode, Photo, Video, Panorama, Face Beauty, HDR, Night Vision, Macro Vision, Pro Mode, High-Res Zoom 7, Google Lens Integration 8, Video Software: Snap in Video Recording
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 8 MP (f/2.0, 1.12μm Pixel Size), Features: Portrait, Photo, Video, Face Beauty, Pro Mode, HDR, Video Features: Snap in Video Recording
product_specification.Sensors: Fingerprint Reader, Proximity Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, Accelerometer, Notification LED
product_specification.Other Features: Gradient Unibody ME, 10 W Charger, Fingerprint Reader, Face Unlock, Voice Control: Google Assistant
product_specification.GPS Type: GPS/ A-GPS, LTEPP, SUPL, GALILEO, GLONASS
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Handset and 6 Months on Accessories

product_description.90 Hz Punch Hole Display: The moto e40 has a 16.51 cm (6.5) Max Vision HD+ Display so that you can enjoy expansive viewing along with a 20:9 aspect ratio. And, with a 90 Hz refresh rate, you can enjoy smooth scrolling and smooth screen usage as well.
product_description.48 MP Triple Camera System: With a 48 MP Triple Camera System with a Depth Sensor and Macro Vision Lens, you can take mesmerising photos no matter the setting or lighting or angle.
product_description.Powerful Processor: Thanks to the custom-designed UNISOC T700 Octa-core 1.8 GHz processor so that you can enjoy a strong graphics performance every time you use the mobile phone.
product_description.4 GB RAM + 64 GB ROM: You can enjoy easy multitasking with the 4 GB of RAM of the mobile phone. Your mobile phone’s performance can be boosted with 64 GB of ROM (that’s expandable up to 1 TB). You can also have enough storage space for all your data.
product_description.5000 mAh Battery: This mobile phone is equipped with a power-packed 5000 mAh battery so that you can do all that you want with enough battery power. This way, you can play music for up to 76 hours, 14 hours of video streaming, and up to 10 hours of website browsing.
product_description.IP52 Water-repellent Design: Thanks to the IP52 water-repellant design, you can enjoy using your phone without worrying about spills and splashes. This way, your phone will be protected from the inside and the outside.
product_description.Fingerprint Reader with Face Unlock: With the fingerprint reader and the face unlock feature, you can enjoy two easy ways of unlocking your phone. Simply touch the fingerprint reader that’s placed beneath the logo for easy unlocking. You can also use the face unlock feature to unlock it with a simple glance.
product_description.Google Assistant Key: You can use the dedicated Google Assistant placed on the side of the moto e40 so that you can enable voice control and find the answers that you need. This way, you don’t have to type, tap, or swipe.

Writing this review after 10 days. As per price product is decent in respect of other brand specially redmi, oppo, Vivo.
1. 90 Hz refresh rate gives smoothness(no brand gives in this price range)
2. Stock Android , no bloatware (no unused app), no ads
3. Rear camera justify the price but front camera should be at least 13MP
4. punch hole display with HD+
5. 2hr+ time for full charge
6. Less featurable phone, not provided:
App clone, inbuilt app lock, inbuilt privacy system, hide app etc.
7. Awesome look with plastic built.
8. Fast face unlock.
Overall I'm satisfied 👍with this product acc to price just not with front camera😔. No brand gives u smooth refresh rate n punch hole display. Go 4 it.

I am writing the review after 40 days of usage.
1. Good build quality(Motorola is known for its excellent build quality).
2. Initially, the caller's complaint of echo in the voice calling but sorted out after help from the Motorola service centre.
3. Camera quality is average (The rear camera is somewhat ok but the front camera is not up to the mark).
4. Speakers are sufficiently loud so that you can enjoy your videos.
5. Talking about the processor, it provides smooth performance.
6. wifi connectivity is only for 2.4GHz if it has 5GHz, It would be better.
7. Display colours are sufficiently bright
8. Battery charging is prolonged; it takes 2.5-3 hrs to charge it fully (10W charging supported only).
Lastly, I would like to say if you want a budget phone, then go for it.

Bought this phone for my mom. Writing this review after 3days of usage. Overall this is a great value for money product. The camera works good in outdoor or in good lighting conditions but same cannot be said for low lighting. Just because it has more mega pixels means you'll get a great camera.. coming to display the 90hz screen is smooth, by default it's on auto you can change it in settings. The ips display is good not that bright though... Only when u keep the brightness to max it get brighter but no issues using outside in bright sunlight conditions.. there no lag or anything i even installed pubg and it ran without any issues... The battery life is great since you get 5000mah.. takes quite a while to get charged as you get only 10w charger and the speakers are not that loud, and sometimes it feels like the sound output is not clean but you should also keep in mind the price of the phone before u judge anything... Overall a great product my mom likes it and im happy with my purchase
